response.overview: Luwang Films Production Shiva Luwang Presents IMA MACHET ICHA TANGKHAI ... child is your precious mother is your prosperity...  Director: Homeshwori Producer: Chingsubam Khumanleima  Introducing: Luwangthoibi Chanu Star Cast: Gokul Athokpam, Gurumayum Bonny, Abenao Elangbam, Soma Laishram, Jayvidya, Edhou, Lokendro, Lalitabi, Santajit.  Music Directors: Nongmaithem Ibomcha  Lyrics: Birmangol Mekola Make up: Poison Asst. Make Up: Kenedy & Scarlet Costume: Galif-Pa Choreographer: Menaka Key Grip: Ingocha & Ajanabi Transportation: Subash, Boyai & Ratan Equipments: Kangla Films & Ngangkhaleima Pictures Post Production: Makki Film Drone Operator: Vikas Leishangthem Production Manager: Namoi Tomba Cinematography & Editor: Regan Kh Written by: Ranjit Ningthouja Producer: Chingsubam Khumanlei
response.title: Ima Machet Icha Tangkhai
